nodes.text: Therefore as the Cambridge astronomer Fred Hoyle points out the Big Bang theory requires the creation of the universe from nothing
as you go back in time you reach a point at which in Hoyle's words the universe was  shrunk down to nothing at all.
The best explanation of the existence of the universe is the creation

The astrophysical evidence indicates the universe began to exist in a cataclysmic explosion known as the Big Bang 15 billion years ago. Physical space and time were created in that event as well as all the matter and energy in the universe
The mass from which the universe was originated at a time t-1 before the Big Bang was smaller than the mass at the time t of Big Bang
